ItemTooltips.gauntlets: The extra HP these give will be invaluable to keeping you alive.
ItemTooltips.branches: Stats will help you through the laning phase. Build the branches into a wand.
ItemTooltips.gem: Kotl isn`t really tanky enough to be relied to hold this but your support role and movement speed means a gem isnt a bad pick up if the team needs one.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: For burst regen you can`t beat a wand. It`s good all game long, espcially against opponents that spam.
ItemTooltips.flask: For regen on the go. Remember to buy more if you or your carry need them.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: Vision of the map if key for victory so make sure you always have wards on you and keep re-warding.
ItemTooltips.tango: For regen on the go. Remember to buy more if you or your carry need them.
ItemTooltips.courier: Get the courier to help everyone out and stop those noob drow players moaning.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: By late game, the regen from tranquils isn`t as useful. So pick up the boots of travel for a global presence to push, defend and farm.
ItemTooltips.bracer: This is easy to pick up because of your illuminate. Farm it up quickly for good stats and build into drums if needed.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Your first big support item. This will help everyone out for regen and armour as well as a heal. If someone else picked up a mek, go for pipe instead.
ItemTooltips.flying_courier: Get this asap for faster deliveries
ItemTooltips.headdress: To stay true to the role of support, get this for aoe regen for your carry and yourself.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: This item is great on KOTL. It gives you a great disable as well as good intel and mana regen. If your team needs some extra help in teamfights get this.
ItemTooltips.orchid: The attack speed and damge. can make you more of a right clicker but that is just an added bonus. The mana regen means your chakra magic only needs to be used on your allies and not yourself. It`s main purpose is to silence enemy threats and make them take extra damage so they die much quicker.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Gives you some small HP regen. mainly however, it will give you extra mobility. Help you help teammates to escape ganks or manoeuvre an enemy hero into a position that your team can kill them.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: If you need some more survivability get shivas. It`s armour will keep you alive and the intelligance is good for mana. The artic blast is a decent nuke but use it for slowing enemies. Try and hit as many as you can.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Drums work well on most heroes and if your team needs them, pick them up. The stats will help you out as well.
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: The extra movement speed and regen will keep you in lane and doing your job. The best boots for kotl.
